title: James Corden Would Rather Not Talk About That Balthazar Omelet
description: In an interview to promote his coming series, “Mammals,” the actor and late-night host dismissed a flap stemming from an Instagram post accusing him of boorish restaurant behavior. “I think it’s so silly,” he said.
dc:creator: Dave Itzkoff
media:description: James Corden found himself the object of online scorn this week after the restaurateur Keith McNally accused him of abusive behavior toward wait staff.
